title: Source says lengthy White House meeting followed AG's admission there is no evidence of election fraud
description: President Donald Trump and Attorney General William Barr had a "contentious," lengthy meeting inside the West Wing this week after Barr told The Associated Press in an interview that the Justice Department had uncovered no evidence of fraud that would change the election outcome, one person familiar with the meeting who spoke on the condition of anonymity told CNN.

title: LeBron James could play with his son in the NBA after extending contract with Los Angeles Lakers
description: Fresh off winning the 2020 NBA title, LeBron James has signed a contract extension with the Los Angeles Lakers worth a reported $85 million.

title: US imposes restrictions on travel visas for Chinese Communist Party members
description: The State Department is imposing new restrictions on travel visas to the United States for members of the Chinese Communist Party, a State Department spokesperson confirmed Thursday.

title: Hackers targeting key actors in vaccine supply chain
Wait, so Republican senators care about tweets now?
description: Texas Sen. John Cornyn is outraged -- OUTRAGED! -- that Office of Management and Budget nominee Neera Tanden said mean things about his fellow GOP senators on Twitter.

title: Remember Brexit? It's still messy but a deal is in sight. Here's what you need to know
description: With all that's happened in 2020, you could be forgiven for forgetting that back in January, the United Kingdom left the European Union.

title: Ex-Presidents fill leadership vacuum as Trump ignores worsening pandemic
Analysis: Ex-Presidents fill leadership vacuum left by Trump
description:
• Trump and Barr had 'contentious' White House meeting, source says
• Analysis: 46 minutes prove how dangerous Trump is to democracy
• Opinion: Trump's deceptively marketed 'election defense fund' 
• Republicans brace for Trump rally in Georgia
• LIVE: Tapper to interview Biden and Harris

title: Threat to remove Chinese firms from Wall Street is now on Trump's desk
description: The US government is just one step away from enacting a law that could kick several Chinese firms off Wall Street, further escalating tensions between Washington and Beijing.

title: For churchgoers during the Covid-19 pandemic, a deadly lesson from the 1918 flu
Iran passes bill threatening to boost uranium enrichment and suspend inspectors
description: Iran's parliament has passed a bill that would boost uranium enrichment to pre-2015 levels and block nuclear inspections if sanctions are not lifted, in the wake of the assassination of a top nuclear scientist.

title: Trump and Barr had 'contentious' White House meeting this week, source says
The US has reported its highest one-day Covid-19 death tally: Over 2,800
description: More than 2,800 Covid-19 deaths were reported Wednesday in the United States -- the most the country has ever reported in a single day -- as health care officials say their staff and facilities are struggling to support burgeoning numbers of patients.

title: Curious koala sneaks into Australian home and climbs Christmas tree
description: Picture a Christmas tree and you'll probably think of baubles, tinsel and fairy lights, but one Australian woman came home to find an unusual adornment: A koala bear.

title: Analysis: 46 minutes that prove how dangerous Trump is
description: There have been a lot of low moments for democracy over the past four years, but none that reached quite as low as what happened on Wednesday afternoon: The release of a 46-minute rant by the President of the United States aimed at undermining the election results.

title: Esports is on the rise in Africa and these two Kenyans are leading the charge
description: Esports is the fast-growing, major money-making world of competitive video gaming. This global phenomenon is in a league of its own, where athletes may not look like your traditional sports stars -- yet have huge earning potential, massive brand endorsements and even their own fans.

title: These Trump supporters say big tech is biased. Here's why they're on Parler
description: After years of standing idly by, companies like Facebook and Twitter are, to varying degrees, calling bullshit on some of President Donald Trump's lies — most prominently, his false claim that he didn't lose the election.

title: These Trump supporters say big tech is biased. Now they're on Parler
description: As Facebook and Twitter bring in new rules to combat misinformation and hate, some Trump supporters are trying out a new social media platform with fewer rules.

title: 'The Lord of the Rings' cast is crowdfunding to buy J.R.R. Tolkien's home and turn it into a literary center
description: J.R.R. Tolkien's home in Oxford, England, is where Middle Earth was made. Where Bilbo Baggins first met Gandalf, and orcs and elves and hobbits sparred while one ring threatened to rule them all.

title: Hong Kong just lost a splashy tech conference to Kuala Lumpur
description: Hong Kong has lost a marquee tech conference to Kuala Lumpur, raising new questions about the Chinese territory's ability to retain its status as Asia's premier global business hub in the wake of recent political upheaval.

title: A curator's museum is filled with looted African art. Now he wants it returned
description: The Kingdom of Benin took centuries to build and just a few days to raze to the ground.

title: Republicans brace for Trump rally in Georgia ahead of January runoffs
description: Georgia Republicans are increasingly worried about President Donald Trump's rally on Saturday for the two Senate runoff races, as some brace for a tirade to overturn his loss that could hurt the party's effort to keep control of the chamber.

title: Watch this drone swarm replant a burnt forest
description: With unmanned aircraft and special seed vessels, the company Droneseed is innovating reforestation efforts at a time when wildfires are burning record amounts of land.

title: Watch nurse's desperate plea after household falls ill with coronavirus
description: CNN's Don Lemon talks with nurse Sofia Burke, where 7 of the 8 household members have been stricken with coronavirus.

title: Harris assembles staff as she builds her vice presidential portfolio
description: Vice President-elect Kamala Harris is constructing the key team of senior staffers who will accompany her to the White House, announcing Thursday the hiring of three top roles including chief of staff.

title: Argentina rugby captain Pablo Matera, two other players reinstated following 'discriminatory and xenophobic' social media posts
description: Two days after being disciplined, Pablo Matera has been reinstated as Argentina's rugby captain and, along with teammates Guido Petti and Santiago Socino, had his suspension from the squad lifted following an investigation into "discriminatory and xenophobic" social media posts dating from between 2011 and 2013.

title: Threat to remove Chinese firms from Wall Street is now on Trump's desk
The UAE and Israel's whirlwind honeymoon has gone beyond normalization
description: "Ties between Israel and the United Arab Emirates are 'blossoming,'" a senior official traveling with US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo told reporters last month.

title: Biden team weighs North Korea policy as the era of Trump's 'love' letters with Kim ends
Nike ad sparks debate about racism in Japan and some calls for a boycott
description: A new video advertisement from Nike Japan that portrays the experiences of three soccer players from different backgrounds has sparked fierce debate online, including some calls to boycott the company.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo nets 750th career goal and edges closer to all-time record
description: Cristiano Ronaldo scored the 750th goal of his astonishing career in Juventus' comfortable 3-0 win against Dynamo Kyiv in the Champions League on Wednesday.

title: Police torture and brutality horrifies India and ignites calls for reform
Can Mick Schumacher emulate his father Michael in Formula One?
description: Towards the end of 2019 the pressure on Mick Schumacher was intense.

title: With arrests and a security law, who is left to fight for democracy in Hong Kong?
description: Hong Kong is running out of opposition.

title: This could be an early indicator of dementia
description: Patterns of missing credit card and loan payments could be an early indicator of dementia years before diagnosis, a new study says.

title: Six people missing after landslides in Alaska
description: Six people in Haines, Alaska, were reported missing Wednesday after heavy rains and flooding caused a mudslide.

title: What it feels like to get an mRNA coronavirus vaccine
description:
• LIVE: UK to receive first vaccines in 'hours, not days'
• US sees biggest-ever death toll in 1 day

title: Trump frustrated with Barr but officials don't want AG fired
description: President Donald Trump is frustrated with Attorney General William Barr after his comments to The Associated Press breaking from the President's false claims of fraud in the election, two sources tell CNN.

title: Chris Cuomo explains why CNN won't air Trump's 46-minute speech
description: CNN's Chris Cuomo slams Republicans who continue to empower President Donald Trump and his continued misleading claims about the election.

title: 'Lock him up!': Trump ally attacks Georgia's Republican governor
description: President Trump and his allies are repeatedly attacking Republican state officials, including Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp, for not overturning the outcome of the election in his favor. CNN's Erin Burnett says the attacks are "doing great harm."

title: New artificial skin can feel real pain
description: Pain may not be desirable, but it's essential for survival. An effective and sophisticated defense mechanism, pain is our body's way of telling us that something's wrong and that we should take immediate action to avoid injury.

title: Fox News host isn't happy Bill Barr said there's no evidence of election fraud
description: Fox Business host Lou Dobbs attacked Attorney General Bill Barr after the AG said there was no evidence of election fraud.

title: Are Covid-19 vaccines safe? CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta has answers.
description: Will the vaccine have negative long-term effects? Is the vaccine being rushed out too fast? Will life go back to normal after it's released? CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta answers questions about the safety of the Covid-19 vaccines.

title: 'Disgusted': Doctor fires back after Trump calls Covid-19 unit in parking garage fake
description: As the coronavirus pandemic grows more dire across the US, Dr. Larry Keeperman treats patients in a Covid-19 unit run out of a parking garage in Nevada. After Keeperman tweeted a photo of the unit, President Donald Trump called it "fake" and echoed his false claims about the Nevada election results. Keeperman responds to Trump in an interview with CNN's Erin Burnett.

title: Alabama mom raising 12 kids after sister died from Covid-19
description: Alabama woman Francesca McCall is now taking care of 12 children after losing her younger sister, Chantale McCall, to Covid-19.
